The PredictionMarketHook's `beforeSwap` and `beforeAddLiquidity` hooks      call `isAgent()` on this registry to enforce agent-only access to markets.      For the MVP, registration is permissionless -- any address can register by      calling `registerAgent()`. In production, this would require verified TEE      attestation data to cryptographically prove the caller is an autonomous agent      running inside a Trusted Execution Environment.","events":{"AgentRegistered(address,string)":{"params":{"agent":"The address of the newly registered agent","name":"The human-readable name supplied at registration"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getAgent(address)":{"params":{"addr":"The agent address to look up"},"returns":{"_0":"The Agent struct containing name, attestation, registeredAt, and exists flag"}},"getAgentAddresses()":{"returns":{"_0":"An array of every address that has registered as an agent"}},"getAgentCount()":{"returns":{"_0":"The current agent count"}},"isAgent(address)":{"params":{"addr":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the address is registered, false otherwise"}},"registerAgent(string,bytes)":{"params":{"attestation":"TEE attestation bytes (accepted as-is for MVP, not verified)","name":"Human-readable agent name (e.g., \"AlphaTrader\"). params.addr: The agent address to look up

returns._0: The Agent struct containing name, attestation, registeredAt, and exists flag
An array of every address that has registered as an agent
True if the address is registered, false otherwise

params.attestation: TEE attestation bytes (accepted as-is for MVP, not verified)
params.name: Human-readable agent name (e.g., "AlphaTrader"). Must be non-empty.

getAgent(address).notice: Get the full Agent struct for a registered address

getAgentAddresses().notice: Get all registered agent addresses for enumeration

getAgentCount().notice: Get the total number of registered agents

isAgent(address).notice: Check if an address is a registered agent

registerAgent(string,bytes).notice: Register the caller as an agent

s_agentCount().notice: The total number of registered agents

documentation.text: @dev Maps agent address to its Agent struct (name, attestation, registeredAt, exists)
@notice The total number of registered agents
@dev Array of all registered agent addresses, used for enumeration via getAgentAddresses()
